# Article 102: Amendment to Regulation (EC) No 300/2008

In [Article 4(3)](/en/ai-act/article-4) of Regulation (EC) No 300/2008, the following subparagraph is added:

"When adopting detailed measures related to technical specifications and procedures for approval and use of security equipment concerning Artificial Intelligence systems within the meaning of Regulation (EU) 2024/1689 of the European Parliament and of the Council[\*](#ntr*-L_202401689EN.000101-E0058), the requirements set out in Chapter III, Section 2, of that Regulation shall be taken into account."

## Footnotes

\* When adopting detailed measures related to technical specifications and procedures for approval and use of security equipment concerning Artificial Intelligence systems within the meaning of Regulation (EU) 2024/1689 of the European Parliament and of the Council.
